items.title: Stuck at green screen (select access point)
items.body:
Hi,
I have successfully compiled and uploaded the code to esp32, connected RCA video and audio output.
Upon boot, the espflix screen comes up with audio and goes to a green screen displaying "select access point" but nothing happens it's just stuck.
What must have gone wrong?

Below is the output of arduino serial monitor:
